query.description: A search string to use for partial matches of role names
Pagination parameter to start returning results from this position of matches
Pagination parameter for how many results to return

body.raw:
{
  "role_id": "6db86c8c-535c-45e4-b7d7-45049c39b69b",
  "name": "Zoo Keeper",
  "description": "Role for the person in charge of taking care of animals",
  "internal": true,
  "namespaces": []
}

query.description: specify the type of the user you want to retrive [all, host, proxy]
The number of records to omit from the response.
Maximum records to retrieve per request. default 25, min 0, max 500
